verse.gurmukhi: hau iqs dY cau KMnIAY gur prmysru eyko jwxY[
verse.unicode: ਹਉ ਤਿਸ ਦੈ ਚਉ ਖੰਨੀਐ ਗੁਰ ਪਰਮੇਸਰੁ ਏਕੋ ਜਾਣੈ।

en.bdb: I am ready to be cut into four pieces for him who accepts Guru and God as one.

transliteration.english: hau tis dhai chau kha(n)neeaai gur paramesar eko jaanai|
transliteration.hindi: हउ तिस दै चउ खंनीऐ गुर परमेसरु एको जाणै।
transliteration.en: hau tis dhai chau kha(n)neeaai gur paramesar eko jaanai|
transliteration.hi: हउ तिस दै चउ खंनीऐ गुर परमेसरु एको जाणै।
transliteration.ipa: ho t̪ɪs d̪æ t͡ʃo kʰəŋniæ Gʊr pərəmesər eekɔ d͡ʒɑɳæ.
transliteration.ur: ها تس دَے چا کھنّیِاَے گُر پرمےسر اےکو جاݨَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: hau iqs dY cau KMnIAY dUjw Bwau n AMdir AwxY[
verse.unicode: ਹਉ ਤਿਸ ਦੈ ਚਉ ਖੰਨੀਐ ਦੂਜਾ ਭਾਉ ਨ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਆਣੈ।

en.bdb: I am ready to be cut into four pieces for him who does not allow the sense of duality to enter in him.

transliteration.english: hau tis dhai chau kha(n)neeaai dhoojaa bhaau na a(n)dhar aanai|
transliteration.hindi: हउ तिस दै चउ खंनीऐ दूजा भाउ न अंदरि आणै।
transliteration.en: hau tis dhai chau kha(n)neeaai dhoojaa bhaau na a(n)dhar aanai|
transliteration.hi: हउ तिस दै चउ खंनीऐ दूजा भाउ न अंदरि आणै।
transliteration.ipa: ho t̪ɪs d̪æ t͡ʃo kʰəŋniæ d̪ud͡ʒɑ ɓɑo nə əŋd̪ər əɑɳæ.
transliteration.ur: ها تس دَے چا کھنّیِاَے دُوجا بھاا ن اںدر آݨَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: hau iqs dY cau KMnIAY Aauguxu kIqy gux prvwxY[
verse.unicode: ਹਉ ਤਿਸ ਦੈ ਚਉ ਖੰਨੀਐ ਅਉਗੁਣੁ ਕੀਤੇ ਗੁਣ ਪਰਵਾਣੈ।

en.bdb: I am ready to be cut into four pieces for him who understands the evil done to him as good one.

transliteration.english: hau tis dhai chau kha(n)neeaai aaugun keete gun paravaanai|
transliteration.hindi: हउ तिस दै चउ खंनीऐ अउगुणु कीते गुण परवाणै।
transliteration.en: hau tis dhai chau kha(n)neeaai aaugun keete gun paravaanai|
transliteration.hi: हउ तिस दै चउ खंनीऐ अउगुणु कीते गुण परवाणै।
transliteration.ipa: ho t̪ɪs d̪æ t͡ʃo kʰəŋniæ əoʊGʊɳ kit̪e Gʊɳ pərəʋɑɳæ.
transliteration.ur: ها تس دَے چا کھنّیِاَے ااگݨ کیِتے گُݨ پرواݨَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: hau iqs dY cau KMnIAY mMdw iksY n AwiK vKwxY[
verse.unicode: ਹਉ ਤਿਸ ਦੈ ਚਉ ਖੰਨੀਐ ਮੰਦਾ ਕਿਸੈ ਨ ਆਖਿ ਵਖਾਣੈ।

en.bdb: I am ready to be cut into four pieces for him who never speaks ill of anyone.

transliteration.english: hau tis dhai chau kha(n)neeaai ma(n)dhaa kisai na aakh vakhaanai|
transliteration.hindi: हउ तिस दै चउ खंनीऐ मंदा किसै न आखि वखाणै।
transliteration.en: hau tis dhai chau kha(n)neeaai ma(n)dhaa kisai na aakh vakhaanai|
transliteration.hi: हउ तिस दै चउ खंनीऐ मंदा किसै न आखि वखाणै।
transliteration.ipa: ho t̪ɪs d̪æ t͡ʃo kʰəŋniæ məŋd̪ɑ kɪsæ nə əɑkʰ ʋəkʰɑɳæ.
transliteration.ur: ها تس دَے چا کھنّیِاَے مںدا کسَے ن آکھ وکھاݨَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: hau iqs dY cau KMnIAY Awpu Tgwey lokw BwxY[
verse.unicode: ਹਉ ਤਿਸ ਦੈ ਚਉ ਖੰਨੀਐ ਆਪੁ ਠਗਾਏ ਲੋਕਾ ਭਾਣੈ।

en.bdb: I am ready to be cut into four pieces for him who is ready to suffer loss for the sake of others.

transliteration.english: hau tis dhai chau kha(n)neeaai aap Thagaae lokaa bhaanai|
transliteration.hindi: हउ तिस दै चउ खंनीऐ आपु ठगाए लोका भाणै।
transliteration.en: hau tis dhai chau kha(n)neeaai aap Thagaae lokaa bhaanai|
transliteration.hi: हउ तिस दै चउ खंनीऐ आपु ठगाए लोका भाणै।
transliteration.ipa: ho t̪ɪs d̪æ t͡ʃo kʰəŋniæ əɑp ʈʰəGɑee lɔkɑ ɓɑɳæ.
transliteration.ur: ها تس دَے چا کھنّیِاَے آپ ٹھگااے لوکا بھاݨَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: hau iqs dY cau KMnIAY praupkwr krY rMg mwxY[
verse.unicode: ਹਉ ਤਿਸ ਦੈ ਚਉ ਖੰਨੀਐ ਪਰਉਪਕਾਰ ਕਰੈ ਰੰਗ ਮਾਣੈ।

en.bdb: I am ready to be cut into four pieces for him who enjoys doing altruistic activities.

transliteration.english: hau tis dhai chau kha(n)neeaai paraupakaar karai ra(n)g maanai|
transliteration.hindi: हउ तिस दै चउ खंनीऐ परउपकार करै रंग माणै।
transliteration.en: hau tis dhai chau kha(n)neeaai paraupakaar karai ra(n)g maanai|
transliteration.hi: हउ तिस दै चउ खंनीऐ परउपकार करै रंग माणै।
transliteration.ipa: ho t̪ɪs d̪æ t͡ʃo kʰəŋniæ pəroʊpəkɑr kəræ rəŋG mɑɳæ.
transliteration.ur: ها تس دَے چا کھنّیِاَے پراپکار کرَے رںگ ماݨَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: laubwlI drgwh ivic mwxu inmwxw mwxu inmwxY[
verse.unicode: ਲਉਬਾਲੀ ਦਰਗਾਹ ਵਿਚਿ ਮਾਣੁ ਨਿਮਾਣਾ ਮਾਣੁ ਨਿਮਾਣੈ।

en.bdb: I am ready to be cut into four pieces for him who enjoys doing altruistic activities.

transliteration.english: laubaalee dharagaeh vich maan nimaanaa maan nimaanai|
transliteration.hindi: लउबाली दरगाह विचि माणु निमाणा माणु निमाणै।
transliteration.en: laubaalee dharagaeh vich maan nimaanaa maan nimaanai|
transliteration.hi: लउबाली दरगाह विचि माणु निमाणा माणु निमाणै।
transliteration.ipa: loʊbɑli d̪ərəGɑh ʋɪt͡ʃ mɑɳ nɪmɑɳɑ mɑɳ nɪmɑɳæ.
transliteration.ur: لابالیِ درگاه وچ ماݨ نماݨا ماݨ نماݨَے۔

en.bdb: Such a humble person understanding the Word of Guru, himself becomes the perfect Guru.
